analysis.Summary: Vue 3 component for uploading and displaying a single image, supporting click-to-select and drag-and-drop, with server upload via Axios.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable image upload area that uploads files to a configured API endpoint and emits the uploaded image URL back to the parent component.

Components.name: UploadImage
Components.responsibility: Renders an upload area, handles user interactions (click, file selection, drag-and-drop), uploads the file, and displays the uploaded image.

Functions.name: onComponentClick
Functions.description: Triggers the hidden file input click to open the native file picker.

Functions.name: onFileChange
Functions.description: Handles file selection (either from picker or drop), uploads the file via Axios to the API, updates the displayed image URL, and emits events.
Functions.parameters: e (Event or custom object with target.files)

Functions.name: onDrop
Functions.description: Handles drag-and-drop by preventing default behavior and delegating to onFileChange with the dropped files.

analysis.Usage: Import the component using `import UploadImage from '@/components/UploadImage/UploadImage.vue'`. Use in templates as `<UploadImage uploadPath="path/to/folder" v-model:photo="imageVariable" @error="onError" />`.
Notes: Supports both click-to-select and drag-and-drop file upload.
Uses environment variable `API_URL` for the base upload request and `FILE_SERVER_URL` for displaying the image.
Emits `update:photo` with the new image URL and `error` on upload failure.
No dedicated <style> section; relies on global utility classes (e.g., flex-v-center, bg-second).
